name: Doom: Temporary (OLD50)
description:
You're possessed with a curse that wants to eat your soul

Your objective is to delay your inevitable death by progressing through randomly generated levels.

The door to the next level will be opened only when you kill enough demons.

There are also shrines which will delay your death.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY ON YOUR PC

Minimap:
# - walls

. - floor

@ - you

D - door

Controls:

WASD - movement

Shift - run

Mouse - camera

Left click - shot

Esc - pause
